body:
See accompanying pull request in AIDASoft/DD4hep#876

@vvolkl, @drbenmorgan alternatively I could also extend the conflict range here:

https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/02aa1d5d48f70e12b0423a595583c710b88456c3/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/dd4hep/package.py#L77-L79

To something like
```python
conflicts(`^cmake@3.16:3.17.2`, when=`@1.15:1.18.1`)
```

That might avoid some of the subtle issues around this whole cmake issue with the python versions. Do you have any preferences on that?
title: dd4hep: Patch cmake regex match that is necessary for some versions
